description:
After defeating his old enemy Ryuuga, Ginga emerged as the overall champion Battleblader. However, before he can even take a breather, a new rival in the person of Kadoya Masamune appears, challenging Ginga for his place as No. 1 Blader.
Meanwhile, the WBBA-sponsored 1st World Tournament looms. Kyouya, Tsubasa, Kenta, Benkei and Yuu fight each other for placement as Japan`s representative.
~ translated and adapted from official site by Cranston

REGULAR.description:
Ryo, Gingka’s father, acts as Director of the new WBBA but the first tournament is disrupted by a blader named Masamune.  Gingka meanwhile is on a quest to replace Storm Pegasus with a Legendary Bey sealed in the mountains near Koma Village.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka defeats Masamune but Masamune challenges Gingka again and again, losing each time.  Masumune trains hard and eventually manages to defeat Gingka, but Gingka learns a valuable lesson about how to work with Galaxy Pegasus.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 不屈の一角獣(チャレンジャー)

REGULAR.description:
New blader Mei-Mei invites Gingka into battle where she is partnered with Chiyun and Gingka is partnered with Masamune. Gingka and Masamune must learn to work together to defeat their opponents, and they do in the nick of time.
Source: crunchyroll

At a qualifying tournament to select representatives for the Beyblade World Championships, Gingka finds that he is already on the team and is not required to battle.
Source: crunchyroll

At a qualifying match for the final spot on Team Japan for the Beyblade World Championships, Kyoya and Rock Leone face off against Tsubasa and Earth Eagle.  The battle is hard fought, but Kyoya emerges the victor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決戦! レオーネVSアクイラ

REGULAR.description:
Since Kyoya has refused to join Team Japan for the Beyblade World Championships, a battle is arranged between Yu and Tsubasa to decide who will be the final Regular Member.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 翔[はばた]け, 世界へ!

REGULAR.description:
Team Japan arrives in China and is invited to their opponents’ practice facility, the Beylin Temple to observe their training rituals.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Beylin Temple in the Sky
天空のベイ林寺(りんじ)

REGULAR.description:
Madoka and Gingka visit the opposing team’s training camp to find out who the third blader is.  Masamune stumbles on this third blader himself – “Chaoxin”, a flashy blader in it for the glory of his fans.
Source: crunchyroll

After his loss to Chaoxin, Masamune begins hard bey training in the wilderness, where he meets a little old man. The mysterious old man repays a meal that Masamune gives him with some unique training that restores Masamune’s confidence.
Source: crunchyroll

In a heated battle, Chiyun taunts Tsubasa relentlessly about his rigid battling style.
Source: crunchyroll

The third and deciding battle of the first round of the Beyblade World Championships features Dashan against Gingka.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and the team travel abroad where they watch Team Desert Blaze do battle with Team Excalibur from the EU.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Bey mit dem Namen eines Helden
The Bey with a Hero`s Name
Yuusha no Na o Motsu Bey

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and the rest of Team Gangan Galaxy travel by train to Russia to meet their next opponents in the Beyblade World Championships.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and his team battle their next opponents in the Beyblade World Championships, the Russian Team, Lovushka. Masamune meanwhile is lost in the countryside, having been tricked into taking a different train than his teammates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 壮絶! 金網デスマッチ!

REGULAR.description:
With Masamune still missing, Yu must take his place in the next battle against Aleksey. Anton and Aleksey have rigged the stadium to emit sound waves that disable Flame Libra’s Special Move, but Yu outsmarts them and claims victory for Team Gangan Galaxy.
Source: crunchyroll

The bladers find themselves in Greece where they must battle the European Union, aka Team Excalibur.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka, Masamune, Tsubasa and Yu try to work on their teamwork skills, but end up quarrelling even more than usual. This leads to Madoka threatening to disband Team Gangan Galaxy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: We Meet Again! Wang Hu Zhong
再会! 王虎衆(ワンフージョン)

REGULAR.description:
Kyoya travels to a country named Savannah to take part in a tournament that will allow him to attend the Beyblade World Championships if he finishes in the top three.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and the rest of Team Gangan Galaxy travel to India to watch India’s Team Chandora do battle with Africa’s Team Wild Fang. Wild Fang wins, but their leader, Kyoya, seems more interested in informing Gingka that his mission in life is to defeat him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 衝撃のワイルドファング

REGULAR.description:
The Beyblade World Championships have returned to Japan, where everyone is excited to watch Gingka battle Kyoya. However, when a restless Masamune challenges Nile, he finds that bravado does not always work, as Nile sends him down to defeat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 天空の神(ホルセウス)VS一角獣(ユニコルノ)

REGULAR.description:
The long awaited rematch between Gingka and Kyoya has finally arrived and their battle is of epic proportions. In the end, their skills are so evenly matched that the two rivals knock each other unconscious and both beys stop spinning simultaneously.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 永遠の好敵手(ライバル)

REGULAR.description:
The third and tie breaking match between Gangan Galaxy and Wild Fang takes the form of a team battle with Yu and Tsubasa facing Benkei and Damoure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Third Match: On The Edge

REGULAR.description:
With Team Gangan Galaxy tied with Team Wild Fang, a fourth and final team battle is set to determine a winner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The End Of A Fierce Struggle!

REGULAR.description:
Team Gangan Galaxy are in shock as they learn that their teammate Tsubasa has been infected by a dark power. Meanwhile, the first battle for a spot in the finals between Excalibur and Wang Hu Zhong is won by Wales and Sophie of the EU team.
Source: crunchyroll

Chiyun battles Klaus in an elimination bout and despite his best efforts, Chiyun loses and Wang Hu Zhong are eliminated from the tournament.  Meanwhile, Hyoma finds Ryuga.
Source: crunchyroll

Julian Konzern and Team Excalibur return to Italy, where Konzern is surprised to be challenged to a battle by Tsubasa.  The battle is interrupted by the unexpected appearance of Ryuga and his new bey, Meteo L-Drago.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 竜皇(エルドラゴ), 再び

REGULAR.description:
Team Gangan Galaxy travels to Italy for the tournament finals, where Masamune loses his match to Klaus of Team Excalibur.  Gingka meanwhile battles his oldest rival, Ryuga.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsubasa and Yu battle Wales and Sophie in the finals, with Tsubasa defeating both his own dark side and the opponents to claim victory.  Gingka meanwhile receives valuable advice from Ryuga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 暗黒鷲(ダークアクイラ)

REGULAR.description:
Julian Konzern and Gingka meet in the final and deciding battle for the A Block of the Beyblade World Championships.  In a close match, Gingka’s Galaxy Pegasus defeats Konzern’s Gravity Destroyer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グラビティペルセウス

REGULAR.description:
Team Gangan Galaxy arrives in Brazil for the Finals of The Beyblade World Championships. Trouble ensues when Yu ventures off on his own to gather information about their opponents.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 白昼のストリートバトル

REGULAR.description:
Yu recovers from his injuries in time to battle Enso Garcia in the first match of the finals, but he and his damaged Libra lose. Masamune defeats Enso in the next match, but then loses to Enso’s sister, Selen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ブラジリアントラップ

REGULAR.description:
Gingka battles Selen and she surprises him by conceding the battle after managing to drain much of Pegasus’s power in the process. In the next match, Gingka defeats Ian to give his team the lead, only to lose to Argo and the teams are tied again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 爆闘! トルネードバトル

REGULAR.description:
Tsubasa and Argo battle to see which of their teams will advance to the finals of the Beyblade World Championships.  Argo starts strong but Tsubasa refuses to quit and he wins in the end.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Gangan Galaxy arrives in the USA to watch the next matches in the Beyblade World Championships. Masamune meets old friends, and battles one, but they call it a draw and vow to fight another day.
Source: crunchyroll

Masamune finds his old friend Toby and through flashback we learn that they made a pact long ago to become the number one bladers in the world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Unser Slogan ist die Nummer Eins

REGULAR.description:
As Gingka and the rest of Gangan Galaxy visit the Dungeon Gym, Zeo battles Ryuga at HD Academy. Ryuga wins and Dr. Ziggurat tells him his plan for world domination.
Source: crunchyroll

Zeo undergoes the “Arrangement” process at Dr. Ziggurat’s lab, and then challenges Masamune to a battle.  The battle ends when Damian arrives and he destroys Tsubasa and Yu’s blades and leaves the two bladers unconscious.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 運命の羅針盤(ピクシス)

REGULAR.description:
With Tsubasa and Yu in the hospital, the rest of Gangan Galaxy attends a match between Team Excalibur and Team Star Breaker.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 凶気の孔雀(ビフォール)

REGULAR.description:
Julian Konzern of Team Excalibur battles Damian Heart of Team Star Breaker.  Damian challenges Julian to a best two out of three match. Julian accepts but is defeated twice in a row.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Guard Dog of Hades: Kerbecs
地獄の番犬(ケルベクス)

REGULAR.description:
Gangan Galaxy tries to pick a replacement member for the Final Battle, but Kenta, Team Wang Hu Zhong and Ryo are all disqualified.  Blader DJ and the American DJ battle to see who will announce the final match, but their battle ends in a tie and they deci
Source: crunchyroll

The final matches of the Beyblade World Championships begin and Zeo of Team Star Breaker battles Masamune of Team Gangan Galaxy.  Dr. Ziggurat tells Zeo that if he loses, his friend Toby’s medical treatments will be discontinued. A desperate and possessed
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ファイナル・カウントダウン

REGULAR.description:
Gingka is ready to face Jack in the second battle of the final round of the Beyblade World Championships but Ryuga suprises everyone when he shows up to take his place. Ryuga uses L-Drago to defeat Jack’s Befall to even the match between Team Gangan Galax
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 竜皇(りゅうおう), 降臨

REGULAR.description:
Ryo tells Team Gangan Galaxy that the US team, Star Breaker, consists of members that have artificially enhanced by Dr. Ziggurat.  Damian and Gingka begin the final battle of the World Championships.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka battles Damian in the final battle as the Beyblade World Championships continues.  Damian’s Kerbecs starts strong, but Gingka’s Pegasus rallies and defeats them and Team Gangan Galaxy become champions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決着! 銀河VSダミアン

REGULAR.description:
The victory party for Team Gangan Galaxy is crashed by Doctor Ziggurat and a group of disgraced bladers who corner Gingka and his friends.  Ziggurat demonstrates the power of his bey-based weapon called Spiral Force, which destroys part of the countryside
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 驚異のスパイラルフォース

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and his friends decide to go after Dr. Ziggurat, but they encounter Ziggurat’s minions who use their beys to try and stop their progress.  Gingka and his friends prevail, and a small group actually makes it aboard Ziggurat’s Hades City, which is no
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 突入! ハデスシティ

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and his friends try to rescue Toby from the clutches of Dr. Ziggurat but are blocked by Julian Konzern.  Wales and Sophie clear the way by battling their former partner, Julian, but they lose. Dashan then battles and defeats Julian but makes Julian
Source: crunchyroll

While Gingka, Masamune and Kyoya try to find Toby in Hades City, Tsubasa is challenged to a battle by Jack. Tsubasa defeats Jack, and Yu destroys Jack’s Arrangement Chamber.
Source: crunchyroll

While Masamune and Gingka try to reach the Spiral Core and Toby, Kyoya battles Damian.  Kyoya defeats Damian just as Dr. Ziggurat warns the world that he intends on selling his invention, Spiral Force, to the highest bidder.  Masamune and Gingka reach the
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and Masamune battle Faust at the Spiral Core.  Faust’s bey, Twisted Tempo, actually sends them to another time and space with a Special Move. Ryuga intervenes by launching L-Drago at Hades City, which damages the Spiral Core.  Gingka and Masamune r
Source: crunchyroll

While Gingka tries to use Pegasus to absorb the excess energy at the Hades City reactor, Masamune finds he must battle Faust again.  It is only when Masamune’s old friend Zeo arrives to join the battle that they are able to convince Faust that he is actua
Source: crunchyroll

WIKIPEDIA_JP: メタルファイト_ベイブレード

titles.title: メタルファイト ベイブレード~爆~
战斗陀螺 金属对决 爆
